author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses the comment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43913#discussion_r1507913911 by @makortel about ```struct SimDataFormats_Associations``` being obsolete and removable.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and test wf 24834.0 runs smoothly.
title: Remove obsolete struct SimDataFormats_Associations
